text: Has anyone checked on Chrissy Teigen today? ( Photo : Rich Polk / Getty Images for Viacom ) Gwyneth Paltrow would be so proud : Chrissy Teigen has given vaginal steaming a whirl. The consistently candid model and cookbook author shared what appeared to be her first vaginal steam with her 18 million - plus Instagram followers Tuesday, as one does if you are Teigen. Goop founder Paltrow memorably praised the treatment in 2015. In a piece on the lifestyle site, the Tikkun Holistic Spa was highlighted for its Mugworth V - Steam.
